RandomEncounters - Class in sammish93.tbage.models
A class that includes an encounter pool and an integer that states how many encounters are to be chosen from said encounter pool to be included in a single game's permutation.
read(GameEngine, String) - Static method in class sammish93.tbage.tools.StringParser
A method that determines if a string is of valid format to pass as either a single-word command, or a combination of two words (verb as the first word, and noun as the second), before returning it as a TreeMap.
